评论详情: Really pleased with this shirt! Doesn't flow out at the bottom like the picture. It is wide but just doesn't look like the picture shows it. It's more straight. But I still really love it anyways! Looks good still and feels so comfortable on. I recommend you try it! I'm glad I did and will more than likely buy more. Lol

I am short with curvy hips yet this top is very flattering and long enough to give good coverage.  The blue color is stunning and the fabric is soft. Appears to be a nice quality item and I will be buying more. I have a little fluff in the middle but if you are more apple shaped I'm not sure if it is roomy enough to fit without being clingy in the midsection

评论概述: NOTE: Shirts are different than the ones purchased in 2018. New ones are not flowy or loose fitting.
评论详情: UPDATED: I first ordered this shirt in blue back in April 2018. My absolute fav tank top, so I ordered three more in Jan 2019. If you read other reviews from 2018 it's clear how the shirts fit and how many people absolutely loved them. The current shirts are NOT the same shirts. The photos from the 2018 reviews are not the same shirts I received in January. However, nothing on the description indicated a change in the product material so I assumed I was getting the same top. I have reviews for both orders below:  JAN 2019 shirts: Pretty shirts, material is thin, typical workout/gym fabric. Despite the description the shirts I received were not flowy or loose fitting, but had a snug fit. These would make a nice workout shirt or shirt for layering. I usually wear either a S (in loose tops) or M ; I ordered these in a S (because a previous order of this shirt was a S and the fit was great) and while the length is good they are a too snug fitting and the armholes are tight. If I was going to reorder I would definitely size up to a Medium or even a Large. The red and green are very pretty, the colors are vivid. The pink is pretty, but thin and see-through, so it would be best used for layering. Unfortunately, because these are different than the top I received a few months ago I'll be returning. Please bring back the old tank that so many in 2018, including me, were raving about :(  APRIL 2018 Shirt: This is my FAV tank top I own. I purchased it 8 months ago and it still looks and fits great, I'm back to order more! I usually wear a small in looser tops, sometimes a Med - I ordered this in a small and it fits great. The blue color is pretty and it washes up very well - I wash on cold and hang it up to dry. The fit around the hem is loose, as pictured. It looks nice with leggings, just note with jean shorts the hem does land at the widest part of the hips and adds some width to that area - so depending on if someone wants, or doesn't want, or it doesn't even matter, it's something I wanted to mention. This top has a definite cotton feel to it, which some might not like in a gym top. That isn't too much of a negative, because it's a nice comfortable shirt, but since it's posted as a gym tank that is something to note. Overall this is my favorite, go-to tank and I highly recommend this top!

I purchased three of these.  I normally wear XL so bought one to try in olive greenish color.  The length is perfect to cover my muffintop & keep covered during weight training class, core, and HIIT.  I did find it to be a little loose in the chest area though I wear a D-cup sports bra.  For the 2nd purchase (teal), I went down to a size L & it was a little more snug in the chest area, yet maintained the right length for me.  I am more of a petite height, so the length would of course work differently for taller women.  Both dark-colored purchases are thick enough to hide a black sports bra.  The material is comfortably breathable & non-clingy.  I now have three of these (purple L the third time).
I like the style, colors. I have a short torso, but this is really long - fits me like a tunic. Guess that's better than too short. I can probably get it hemmed.

This top is very roomy and comfortable.  I'm a short person 5'4" and it's really long for me.  It fits me like a very short mini dress but it's really pretty.  The material is very nice.  I would recommend a tall person for this top though.

this tank is loose fitting but not too loose--does not cling so thank you for that!  great quality --I bought a couple tanks from Amazon that looked identical to this one only to find they were super cheap material--lesson learned--this tank is a little more but worth it!

评论概述: Size fits as expected.  Great top, I now own 2 of them.
评论详情: I am 5 ft. 4 " not so tall, wear a Medium (size 7 / 8), 120 pounds, 36-C, and this fits great.  I wanted a shirt that did not make me look like I was stuffed into a sausage skin.  I live in a very warm climate zone, and needed a cool, comfortable top to wear during the summer.  It looks nice, works perfect over leggings.  comfortable, soft, feels great, and the  material is very nice.  I now own two of them, and will probable pick up other colors.
The tank is fine.  I was looking for a navy as pictured.  This is a lighter blue.  Other than that it's as described.

评论概述: Nice quality, doesn't fit like expected
评论详情: The shirt is a nice quality, I like the colors (I got the black, green, and wine).  As is always the case, the colors are brighter on Amazon than they are in real life.  The green, which looks bright teal in the photos, is actually more of a dark teal/forest green.  But the material is light and airy, which is what I wanted for running.  The fit is the worst part.  Based on the reviews of some other ladies who had the shirt size and height/weight in the review, I got my normal t-shirt size.  One review specifically said she was 5'5" and 190 lbs and got the L.  I am 5'6" and 211 lbs so I got the XL and it's tight around the belly and bum because of my hips.  Granted, I'm pretty pear shaped and my upper torso is small, but the shirt clings to my hips something fierce.  I'm going to keep the shirts because I'll keep losing weight and I like the material.  I wish the colors were more accurately portrayed, though.

Very confortable at any weight.  I'm 64 and don't usally like to where anything sleeveless, but this shirt is like tunic and covers the stomach which is my bad area.  It's hard to find clothes that hide the stomach.  I have small legs, a small rear, and pretty small hips, it all in the stomach which got worse after I quit smoking.So if your looking for a cooler top thats makes you feel comfortable, and good at the same time I would get it.
The length is perfect
I love this tank. This is super comfy! Very flowy. It was little big but I was okay with it.
ordered a medium. Got a medium but having it on, it felt so much  larger. The shirt is huge. If you plan to run in it, I wouldn't, it's a heavy material.

Agree with the majority - it ran very long.  And it ran big.  I read every review and then read the size chart.  Screw the size chart.  I am 148 lbs, 33 waist, 43 hips and a 36C and I am NOT a medium.  At 5'4" and all torso, the small may work.  Debating on going back for the small.  It was a decent quality, but not over the top, but for $25, it was meh.  Update.  I returned for a small which worked perfectly.  I imagine if you are any larger in the chest (greater than 36C) it will run tight.  But glad I exchanged for the small.  Still a funky top.  Feels like it the 90s again.
I recommend ordering a size smaller.
I liked how long this top was. The material does not wrinkle

Comfortable, breathable, love the color. I thought it was a wicking fabric when I purchased it, but it absolutely is NOT wicking, which seems counterintuitive for something advertised as a workout tank.  Although not being used for the purpose for which I originally bought it (working out) I kept it because it’s still cute and comfortable for warm days and lounging.
So cute, I'm not gonna use it for working out.  It's actually a little bit longer than a second one I ordered in black and a little more "hand" to the fabric.  Pretty nice!
The colors were as pictured, the size was accurate, and material is comfy, good thickness!

I love this tank! It’s flowy and comfortable. I did not want a tight fit. The length is great too bc it covers my butt. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is that the laundry tag says it can’t go in the dryer. Not a huge deal, but I feel that activewear should be easy care. But it’s really cute and comfy!
I like this sleeveless top for going to the gym. It is a loose fit and long which I like. Good price. It’s a little see thru but if you wear a sports bra it’s fine.

评论概述: Not the same material as stated in the description or on the clothing tag
评论详情: I wanted to love this tank top. The fit is roomy for me because I don't care for skin hugging / snug tops. It fits great, BUT I'm not happy about the material. It clearly states that it's polyester spandex. Ok, cool. I'll order a top and see how the style is. Unfortunately, the description fails to mention that there is rayon in it as well, which gives it a different feel than just poly / spandex as stated.. its almost as though a feel of a cotton top  I was hoping that information was accurate, but it isn't, so I won't be buying more tops of this brand. Very disappointed
Ordered my usual size and it fit. Material is of good quality.

This tank is awesome but it runs a little big. I ordered one size down after I returned the first one.  It’s longer in length and the fabric is nice.  The pattern I ordered was unique and I got a lot of compliments.
I like that this shirt is long and covers my stomache. The material feels different than the others in this style.

I was looking for a long and flowy workout top that wasn’t unflattering for my size and shape and modest enough for a mom to take walks in with yoga pants. I’m 5’4” 230 lbs, bottom curvy and not especially busty. The length covers my butt well enough and the fit is loose around the hips and sits perfectly on the bust, with no awkward side boob or cleavage. I’m comfortable working out with this on around others and taking walks around the neighborhood. If you’re looking for a workout/around the house/active tank that’s comfortable and flattering, this is it. The quality of fabric and craftsmanship doesn’t look or feel cheap. Not a big risk here, try it!

This is more like a mini dress - way too long and does not look good with any of my yoga pants. Too bad because the colors were very pretty. I wear this shirt maybe 2x a year, and usually only around the house because it is so unflattering.

After surgeryI gained weight in my mid section and could not find a summer top that looked nice and covered my pear shape without looking like I had on a man’s big and tall over sized sloppy t shirt . Amazingly this top covered all and keeps me cool. It even covers the bra under my arms without being tight around my chest. It  is a must have and great value for the price

I bought this shirt in green, fell in love, and bought it in black and red. Then, I kept running into a problem where all 3 were dirty (and I hadn't done laundry) so I just added pink and purple to the collection. This shirt is so soft and comfortable. It's very flowy. I've gotten numerous compliments while wearing it

This color isn’t the vibrant green in the photo but a drab  pine colored green.  It’s also see-thru.  I have the same tank in pink and purple and like them a lot, even they also were not nearly as vibrant as the photo colors which was disappointing.  Unfortunately I just missed the return date for this because I accidentally shipped it to my old address which was 6 hours away and I said hold onto to it until I visit, wrongly assuming it would be similarly disappointing as the first two, but good enouhj
Looks great Quite happy with product

评论概述: Very flattering but runs a bit small
评论详情: I’m a size 14, 5’6”, 195lbs and bust is 38DDD.  I bought  the 2xl. It fit before I lost weight and was still a size 16 too. It fits perfectly through the bust, a little loose through the waistline to hide imperfections and is long enough to hide my bum in leggings. I feel it could shrink if I dried it too much so I basically fluff it in the dryer and then hang it to air dry. So far it’s held it’s shape and I haven’t noticed any issues wit crooked seams like you get on some shirts. I love the colors too!

This is the second tank that I ordered. The first one ( orange color) fit perfectly- loose, but flattering. The second one (floral) is very pretty, but gaps under the arms. I have to ask someone to take it in. Both very pretty, but frustrating that same company is not consistent with size. I measured and the floral one is wider under arms. Beware of this. The floral one is dressier ( more sheen material).
Nice flowy tank - good for summer heat - probably not great for yoga if you're doing downward dogs ;-)

I got this to work out in but actually it's between a little dress to wear with bike shorts and top. Still nice, too big to work out in and look good, so I will wear it with bike shorts for around town.

I wasn't hesitant to order more than one at first.  I got the first top and tried it on and it fit perfectly.  Loose without making you look pregnant as some tunics do.  Great for working out, working in the yard, or just wanting to be comfortable and cute all at the same time.I have gone and bought a 2nd one and plan to keep buying more.

I LOVE these tops so much that I got them in 5 colors! They hide any tummy issues really well and are flowy and fit kind of like a-line. They also have a nice cut around the arms and cover some of that area under your armpit. The material dries quickly as well.
Nice fabric  fits very comfortable but not as brilliantly colored

This top is super long, which I love for a workout top, the material is very good quality, keeps moisture but does not show sweat which is huge bonus! Not tight but also not baggy to where it makes my thickness look even thicker :) I absolutely love this top

评论概述: Bust fit as expected, but much longer
评论详情: The fit across the shoulders and chest was as expected but it was way longer than I expected it to be. It came down about 5 inches past my butt, and I have a kind of long torso. I tried it on with a few different pairs of pants, but because of the length and how wide the bottom of the shirt is the only thing it looked right with was leggings or bike shorts. It's actually really cute with the bike shorts.

评论概述: Perfect top to beat the heat
评论详情: I bought three of these for a recent trip to Universal Studios. I knew it would be hot and humid and that we’d be doing a ton of walking and would have long days. These were perfect- they looked cute, and I never felt damp from the humidity.
A lot longer than expected
Thick nice fabric, it is soft and cut long. Drapes well over my body nice flattering cut. Would purchase in every color - with in reason…

评论概述: Size down due to extra fabric in front
评论详情: I loved the photo of this tank and bought it as a pickleball workout top. When I got top, it was very large! I usually buy XL workout tops to make sure I have enough room in the hips and tummy. This one was huge and it looked like a pregnancy top and print was not flattering in the larger size! Love the length but too much material in front. Size down would be my recommendation on this top!  I returned it and got a Large in a different patterned and love it!
I bought this 4 years ago.  I didn't realize it because it's washes well, holds it's color and shape,  and has a flattering cut if you have lost your skinny waist. I am buying another if I can!
Colorful Shirt, Light Weight, Thought it would be more fitted, but its comfortable to wear. Recommend

评论概述: Love this tank but disappointing deformity
评论详情: I love this tank top!  I’m 6ft tall and the length is better than I could have expected.  I then ordered 2 more in a smaller size because xl is too big.  The only problem is that one side of the shoulder straps is sewed up wrong and it curves out so it doesn’t even lay right.  I thought it may have just been pressed wrong in the package so I washed and dried it but it’s clear that it’s a deformity.  Now it’s unfortunately too late to return it.  Disappointing!!
This looks great on over leggings. Colors are beautiful. Great fit.

The material is soft and comfortable. I ordered the light grey. The color is the same as the Amazon photos. (Sometimes products arrive, the colors not as vibrant as the Amazon photos)  I ordered one size smaller then usual because I didn't want it to look like a maternity top, it fits great, not form fitting and not super baggy.  The length is perfect, drops to top of my thigh in the front and covers my booty in the back. (I'm a tall girl)  The arm holes are comfortable, (not tight or inside my armpit like some tank tops )  I washed the top in cold water on the delicate cycle and hang dried. It Didn't loose its shape or size.  The price is too high for this tank top $23. If it was priced at $14 I would buy all colors.  Arrived in two days via Amazon Prime
This top fits nicely and covers the rear. It is a bit more boxy than I would prefer but I definitely like it and will wear it.
This shirt feels soft to the touch. Looks just like the picture. Fits true to size. Love the colors they are not faded looking. You can use it to workout in it or dress it us (just like I did).

评论概述: The print is prettier than the picture.
评论详情: The cut is very flattering.  The scoop neck line was not too low.  This top will be perfect for workouts.

I would like to think I am not the only female that likes to have both crotch and butt covered when wearing leggings. The trend is back to cropped tight tops. There are many middle aged ladies and seniors that need and want that tunic length. NICE FIND. FLATTERING.
Runs a bit smaller

评论概述: Cute top that is comfortable and lays nicely
评论详情: I was looking for summer tops that would fit well to wear to my child's activities or as I become more active this summer.  Normally I would wear a 16W but I wanted something that would look nice both now and as I continue to lose weight.  These tops are made with a very nice medium weight, soft fabric.  They are cut in an A-line shape that is not too snug across my middle right now and it would lay nicely if you don't have a larger stomach.It feels like it will wash-up nicely and not lose its shape.  The fabric is cut unlike a T-shirt that can be stretched bigger.  I would buy these again.

I first purchased a 2XL because I thought I needed that for my tummy area and to cover my butt. But honestly, it didn’t fit right. So I got the XL Instead and it’s perfect!  Fits my shoulders so much better, and the smaller size is better for my armpit area as well. It’s actually flattering on me!

评论概述: order smaller with these type of gym shirts
评论详情: I didn't like how it looked on me, to loose
I was impressed of the quality of the product. Love it!

I've been looking for a long time for a workout shirt like this!  I wanted something flowy that would cover my belly and bum!  I hated how the more clingy tops looked on me. I hold weight in my middle section, so I don't exactly want to draw attention to it!  Now I do wear a tighter shirt underneath because when you do exercises on the weight floor (like burpees), it will ride up some I I don't want to show any skin!  But the majority of my workout is on the treadmill and rower....so this works great for me.  I ended up buying two more after my first purchase!
Comfortable

I take cycling (spin) classes at the gym regularly.  I am not crazy about "fitted" shirts around the middle and I wanted one that I didn't have to worry about coverage at the top.  This one is PERFECT!!!!!  The arm holes don't hang down like some work out tops do so I am very happy about that.  It fits perfectly all the way around.  I am 5'4", 145lbs and carry what weight I do gain in my mid section.  I bought a large and it's just the right size. I only ordered one just in case I did not like it.  I will be ordering more, in different colors.

I usually hate buying clothes online as I’m picky how things fit and vary in size, however I needed some tank tops for an upcoming cruise next month and found these. I absolutely love the way it fits and the color! It seems to be very well made and good quality material. It fits very well around shoulder and bust area, mid section and bottom are very flowy and flattering, this comes to just past my butt. Definitely will be ordering more of these if they hold up on the cruise and washing! For reference I got a large, I’m 5’5 and about 190lbs and have a bit of a mid section due to my weight and this hides it very well!
This is my second one of these. They are soft and comfortable.

评论概述: For the price I was expecting more: material is very thin and see-through.
评论详情: For the price of $25, I was certainly expecting much higher quality. I would pay perhaps $10 or $12 for this shirt. I wanted something loose and "flowy" for physical therapy. I was extremely disappointed as soon as I opened the package and felt/saw the thin see-through material. This might be okay for someone who does not mind (or likes) showing everything under a shirt, but I don't. If I decide to keep the shirt, I will need to wear another tank underneath but that defeats the entire purpose and creates unnecessary heat. I predict the hem around the bottom will come undone by the second or third wash just like another shirt of this style did. The color is pretty and the coverage is acceptable - but the material is way too thin for me.

I was unsure when I received it and saw that it wasn’t meant to be put in the dryer. I probably wouldn’t have ordered it if I had seen that first. I went back to the site and saw that it was listed in the care but I also noted that several reviews stated it have done well in the dryer. So I did and it did. It is very soft and fits well. No shrinkage.

I have to agree with many of the previous reviewers.  Thanks for those!  Because of you I bought this gem!  This Blue racerback top is soft, comfortable, covers all you want covered, non-clingy and non-wrinkly.  Bought it for yoga class and I love, love, loved it so much that I bought the Black.  The Black has a slightly different fabric blend.  I prefer the blend of the Blue fabric, but the Black is a close 2nd.I bought an OTHER BRAND "flowy" in a similar style, but it was so wrinkled when it arrived and so clingy, I knew that wasn't the fabric for me.

评论概述: Very comfortable and flattering workout tank.
评论详情: Overall I am very pleased with this shirt. The cut is very flattering; flared to hide a bit of a post-pregnancy tummy, not to low cut at the neck, no gaping arm holes. I am 5'2" 155 and very busty, and the medium fits me perfectly. The only potential problem I see is the fabric, I have a feeling that it will start to pill up with a few workouts and washes. The washing instructions say not to tumble dry, so hopefully line drying will extend the life of this item.

It's a beautiful  blouse but if you are under 5 feet the blouse looks like a mini dress. Make sure you order the right size and if your are big breasted or heavier go a size lower the bottom makes up for a lot of room for comfort.  Wish I had returned it for a medium instead of large. Too late to return. :-(

This top was very soft and breathable but you can see my bra through if. It also shrank during the first wash even with a cold wash and tumble dry somehow. It’s much shorter than expected as well, but I do have a large bust

I like these better than any of the other tops on Amazon's site because they have some cotton in them so are better looking and much more comfortable than the all-synthetic ones. They come out of the dryer wrinkle-free. Wear them over capris for indoor tennis in the winter - just long enough to cover one's derrière, and I'm 5'10".  At 124#, a perfect fit for me would be smaller in the waist and hips, but I think most people would find them true to size. Wish there were more colors
Came quickly, nice material and fits well

Long tank top which is what I enjoy, I ordered up cause of online but you could honestly probably order your true size. I ordered a large and I wear it hiking and it's a nice flowly tank, super casual and cute. Material is sturdy, got a couple tree branches snagged and still no holes, so that's an a plus solid from me. Lol
I like that this shirt fits true to size. Actually , I often wear Xl on Amazon tops, but the large fits me best. 5’7 and 155lbs.  Very pretty. Bought one more.

Love love love these tanks. I’ve put on a few pounds the last year, especially in the kid section, and these are the only tanks I’ll wear to the gym. Nice and loose in the midsection and just long enough to cover my back end without being too big in the arm holes which I’ve experienced with other tops. I bought the black originally and immediately bought two more colors. I wear them to work out in and they are nice and light and breathable but also just thick enough and so soft. I would wear them as casual wear as well. I researched a many racer back flowy tanks and I think I hit the jackpot with this one.

The top fit ok, but I was expecting the material to be nicer considering the price. It also was not long like I thought it would be. I would have kept it had it not had a blemish in the material itself that made it look like a white thread was stuck right in the center chest area being too noticeable. Had to return.

评论概述: I really like this shirt but had to return it for one ...
评论详情: I really like this shirt but had to return it for one size larger because it was a bit too clingy/tight around my huge hips and my 3 c-sections in 5 years mommy tummy. It wasn’t flowy enough to flow right on over those lovely areas and effectively hide them, which is kinda what I wasn’t expecting. The size larger was flowy, flowin’ all over the place, perfect around my midsection but a bit too large everywhere else in my shoulders, etc. I have pretty big boobs and both my normal size and the size larger fit fine in the chest. They were actually pretty flattering in the chest and made them look pretty darn good actually.
It’s ok. Not what I was looking for but gonna keep it
Love the fit and style but the colors were off. It’s was not the pretty green as shown in the picture.  But I still love it.

评论概述: comfy and perfect for a workout!
评论详情: i am 5’7” and 182lbs and got a large and it is very comfortable fit and stretchy material. i am a 36h us size in bras as well and the tank top stretched comfortably without feeling constricting. love this top so much! satisfied is an understatement :)

评论概述: Great shirt, but the tag is unbearable
评论详情: For as much as this shirt cost, I would expect a little thought would be put into it.  I bought two of these to work out in and the tag has sharp corners and is unbearably itchy.  Even worse, it's impossible to remove because for some reason, they used a CLEAR, THIN, PLASTIC thread to attach it.  I couldn't wear the shirts at all with the tags in (rubbing my upper back nearly raw), so I tried to remove them with surgical scissors (small, thin, exact) and ruined the seam on one of the shirts. :(  Reconsider for the cost - they need to screen print the tag information on these or at least move the tag to the side seam.

Perfect lightweight tank for hiking, going to the lake, working out, etc.  Fits as expected which is quite a feat for me being 6’2” woman who wears size 18/20. Many things are simply too short. Not this one. It hit right at my hip. Loved it so much I just bought 2 more colors!
This tank is very soft, it is a bit smaller than some of my other tanks the same size.

A few years ago I was getting tops similar to this but they are no longer available. They were heavier and did not cling. This looks much better online than in real life. I wish I liked it better because I have been looking for the same quality and style as I was getting a few years ago. Way too expensive for the quality. Style is cute.
This top fit well, but was entirely too long. I bought my normal size, XXL, and was very disappointed.

评论概述: I Bought 1 and came back for more
评论详情: Love this shirt for working out.  It is loose fitting at the hips, which is great after having 2 kids.  The fabric is super soft and absorbs all of my sweat with not too much discoloration. I had bought one shirt to see how it would fit and feel, and loved it so much that I bought another! I'm 5'-10" and it's a nice long length for me to be stretching and moving around without my stomach showing.
Color was not as pictured. It is more red than wine color. Sizing is larger than expected. Fabric was nice but I did return the product.
Nicely made shirt.

评论概述: Bought in 2017 and still wear it.
评论详情: I bought this in 2017 and it's still in great shape and I still wear it weekly. It's extremely flattering and doesn't cling around your belly.

评论概述: Cute and affordable- bought a few
评论详情: Cute affordable top! Great for pairing with yoga pants/shorts - hangs low on my butt which is what I wanted. Good fit. The color was a tad more orange than I was expecting but I love it. A very warm red, I guess.
I love the true to size fit, good fabric and excellent service by seller.

I absolutely LOVE this shirt. I wish I'd gotten them in every color. The fit is perfection. It's form fitting in the chest but loose and flowy elsewhere, not hugging the tummy or hips. I couldn't ask for a better fit. Very happy!!!💕
Fits great, nice length
Liked the material  , runs a bit shorter for my preference
Good purchase

评论概述: Best and most comfortable work out top
评论详情: I absolutely love, love, love these tops! They are so comfortable and fit me very well. I love them so much that I now own 5 of them and will be purchasing 2 more next month.  The one thing that I will say is that I carefully read the fabrication of the tops and because they contain rayon and could shrink, I wash them in a lingerie bag on delicate and hang them to dry and have not experienced any shrinkage at all.

not sure why but I have the. black one and it is a nice fabric weight.  not see through.  so ordered the green and as soon as I took it out of bag noticed it was a different weight.  can see right through it.  same exact product and size.  poor quality control and at that price. very disappointing.  may return it.  I liked the substantial weight of 1st one.  also not flowy and I have an xl sized up.
Shirt was good quality and fit well. It was just a little long for my taste and would be great for someone who is hiding a little extra insulation around the waste area if you know what I mean .

I really wanted some shirts that weren’t super tight or too hot because I live in FL. These really are very nice shirts, I LOVE the fit, they aren’t low cut, they are loose but not baggy, and they are a good length. They are really comfortable too, however, they aren’t breathable at all. I spend a lot of time outdoors and every time I’ve tried to ware these I end up having to change because they are just way too warm. I wish I could find these exact shirts in cotton.

评论概述: On the long side but a nice quality tank!
评论详情: Based on other reviews and the hope for a large flowy tank, I decided to go a size up (normally I am a 12/14 and wear a large but bought an XL). The tank is a nice color (I opted for the red) and quality. However the downfall is it is incredibly long. Not exactly the look I was going for but it will work to throw on and do yard work etc. Certainly if you are looking for coverage length wise this tank is for you!
